lead_paragraph: Arnaud Clement came back from a deficit in each set to beat Marat Safin 7-6 (5), 7-6 (4) and reach the final at the Legg Mason Tennis Classic.
snippet: Arnaud Clement came back from a deficit in each set to beat Marat Safin 7-6 (5), 7-6 (4) and reach the final at the Legg Mason Tennis Classic.
